tool_description: A API that returns first names, last names or both.
title: Names API

api_list.name: Get random full name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://names-api.p.rapidapi.com/fullname/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "names-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get random first name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://names-api.p.rapidapi.com/name/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "names-api.p.rapidapi.com"
